page.title: 04HOOK NORTON LEISURE GROUPS
page.content: {The Film Society} meets at the Memorial Hall to see films that are not shown on television, and to share a meal. {The Football club} meets at the Sports and Social Club. The group aims to revive football for the young men of the area. Special events include a six-a-side competition. {The Girl Guides} meet at the Baptist Hall. Members - girls aged 10-14.The group aims to organise activities to give girls new interests. {The Horticultural Society} meets at the Sun Inn. The group aims to promote the good cultivation of gardens.Special events include the Spring, Summer and Autumn shows. {The Judo Club} meets at the Memorial Hall. The group aims to have all members graded by the British Judo Association.
